title: DELETE*REPLICA Tests fail frequently on jenkins
description:
DeleteReplicaTest and DeleteLastCustomShardedReplica tests have been failing on Jenkins from the time around when the 4x->5x changes happened.

It might very well be another commit around that time and not be related to the svn move/back ports etc.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1682173 from shalin@apache.org in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1682173 ]

SOLR-6593: SOLR-7599: Re-enable DeleteLastCustomShardedReplicaTest on trunk
